about_the_game:
Support The Developer and get lots of cool stuff!
  • Unlock over 80 VIP only customization items!
  • Ability to host private games (and add bots to them!)
  • Public games give you X2 amount of EXP points!
  • When voting for a map in public matches, your vote counts X3!

Unlock a Treasure Trove of Customization Items!
Dive into a world of +64 VIP-only customization items, giving your character a unique edge and style that stands out from the crowd. Show off your personality and dominate the competition in style.

Take Control as the Ultimate Host!
Get the ability to host private matches, where you are the mastermind! Handpick any mode and map, giving you the power to curate the perfect battleground for epic battles with friends. Prove your strategic prowess and create unforgettable gaming sessions.

Double the Fun in Public Games!
Earn X2 the experience points in public games, accelerating your progress and unlocking new rewards faster than ever before.

Your Vote Counts Triple!
Influence the game's direction by casting your vote for maps in public matches, and watch as your voice has three times the impact. Shape the battlefield to your liking and rally your fellow gamers behind your favorite choices.

Support the Developer, Unleash the Fun!
By purchasing this DLC, you're not only getting incredible in-game advantages but also directly supporting the developer. Your contribution ensures a thriving gaming experience for everyone, with more exciting updates and content on the horizon. Join the ranks of the elite, unleash your creativity, and support the future of the game. Get the DLC now and enjoy a gaming experience like no other!

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity without genitals and cartoon violence.
